content.text:
# First Nations in Prince Edward Island

There are two First Nations on Prince Edward Island: the Abegweit First Nation and the Lennox Island First Nation. Ethnically, they are both Miâ€™kmaq. Each of these nations have two reserves. Of PEI's 1,405 registered Mi'kmaq (2021), only 615 live on one of the four reserves.
Band governments
*Abegweit First Nation
*Lennox Island First Nation
